name: Gold or Glory
overview: The time is summer 1988, the place is Seoul, Korea, the reason is the Olympic Games. You are the women's javelin coach and you are worried our two great medal hopes have not been performing their best since arriving two weeks ago. Something is amiss. It is Wednesday, if you cannot resolve the problem in time for the event on Saturday then our medal hopes will go down the tube. But where to start? In your hotel, of course!
